channel.title: Sam on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Sam on funPlantGenes

item.title: CsFTL3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsFTL3 Gene Name: FLOWERING LOCUS T-like 3 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum seticuspe Functional Descriptions: In chrysanthemums, FLOWERING LOCUS T-like 3 (FTL3) has been identified as a floral inducer produced in the leaves after short-day stimuli and transported to the shoot tip.

item.title: CsLFY
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa1G000050.1 Gene Symbol: CsLFY Gene Name: LEAFY Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsLFY is required for shoot meristem maintenance via interaction with WUSCHEL in cucumber.

item.title: PvSAMS1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Pavir.9NG074700 Gene Symbol: PvSAMS1a Gene Name: S-adenosylmethionine synthase Genome: Species: Panicum virgatum Functional Descriptions: Down-regulation of PvSAMS impairs S-adenosyl-L-methionine and lignin biosynthesis, and improves cell wall digestibility in switchgrass.

item.title: PvSAMS1b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Pavir.3NG187374 Gene Symbol: PvSAMS1b Gene Name: Genome: Species: Panicum virgatum Functional Descriptions: Down-regulation of PvSAMS impairs S-adenosyl-L-methionine and lignin biosynthesis, and improves cell wall digestibility in switchgrass.

item.title: SlBES1.8
